post.author: Site Admin
post.content:
Two corporation executives, while attending a business convention, met in the men's room.
Mr. Brown, the Harvard graduate, washed his hands after urinating. Mr. Smith, the UCLA graduate, washed his hands before he relieved himself.
"At Harvard," said Mr. Brown, "One learns to wash his hands after relieving himself."
"At UCLA,"retorted Mr. Smith, "One learns not to piss on his hands!"
post.title: 하버드와 UCLA, 두 대학교육의 차이
